name: Test the swab & rinse limit of Nitrosamine map to production
description: This test case test the swab & rinse sample limit of Nitrosamine map with production whenswab & rinse sample unit is in ug/ml & surface area is sqm and volume is L
descriptionHtml: This test case test the swab & rinse sample limit of Nitrosamine map with production whenswab & rinse sample unit is in ug/ml & surface area is sqm and volume is L

self = <test_nitrosamine_chemical_limits.TestNitrosamineChemicalSampleLimit object at 0x000001B3C4D2DE50>

    @allure.title("Test the swab & rinse limit of Nitrosamine map to production")
    @allure.description("This test case test the swab & rinse sample limit of Nitrosamine map with production when"
                        "swab & rinse sample unit is in ug/ml & surface area is sqm and volume is L")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86ctyn8m1")
    @pytest.mark.nitrosamine_swab_rinse_limit
    @pytest.mark.validate_nitrosamine_swab_rinse_sampling_limit_ug_ml_sqm
    def test_validate_nitrosamine_swab_rinse_sampling_limit_ug_ml_sqm(self):
        policy_data = {"useSwabPerSampleLimit": False, "useRinsePerSampleLimit": False, "rinseSampleUnit": "ug/ml",
                       "swabSampleUnit": "ug/ml"}
        data = {}
        get_policy = json.loads(self.update_nitrosamine.test_get_nitrosamine_cleaning_limit_policy())
        get_policy = get_policy["policy"]
        swab_unit = get_policy["limitRepresentation"]["sampleLimits"]["swab"]["unit"]
        rinse_unit = get_policy["limitRepresentation"]["sampleLimits"]["rinse"]["unit"]
        update_policy = create_cleaning_limit_policy_nitrosamine_payload(get_policy, policy_data)
        data.update({"update_policy_payload": update_policy})
        if get_policy != update_policy["data"] or rinse_unit != "ug/ml" or swab_unit != "ug/ml":
            self.update_nitrosamine.test_update_nitrosamine_limit_policy(data)
            self.change_assessment.test_start_cleaning_assessment(scenario=True)
            self.change_assessment.test_submit_approve_cleaning_assessment()
        production_id = PRODUCTION_ID
        for prod in production_id:
            data.update({"production_id": prod})
            swab_sheet_name = prod.lower() + "_nitro_swab"
            rinse_sheet_name = prod.lower() + "_nitro_rinse"
            swab_columns = ["Nitrosamine ID", "swab_limit_ug_ml"]
            rinse_columns = ["Nitrosamine ID", "rinse_limit_ug_ml"]
            manually_calculated_swab_limit = self.calculated_chemical_excel(swab_sheet_name, swab_columns)
            manually_calculated_rinse_limit = self.calculated_chemical_excel(rinse_sheet_name, rinse_columns)
            data.update({"production": prod})
            swab_limit = self.get_production.get_production_nitrosamine_swab_limit(data)
            rinse_limit = self.get_production.get_production_nitrosamine_rinse_limit(data)
            compare_sal(swab_limit, manually_calculated_swab_limit, swab_columns, self.ERROR_MESSAGE)
>           compare_sal(rinse_limit, manually_calculated_rinse_limit, rinse_columns, self.ERROR_MESSAGE)

    def compare(sal1, sal2, error_message):
        if sal1 != "#N/A" and sal2 != "#N/A":
            if sal1 < 1:
                length = (floor(log10(sal1)) - 1)
            else:
                length = 15 - len(str(int(sal1)))
            if length < 0:
                sal1 = (round(sal1, -length + 3))
                sal2 = (round(sal2, -length + 3))
                tolerance = calculate_tolerance(sal1)
